snippet.title: Re:Legend Square Enix Collective Trailer
snippet.description:
Kickstarter LIVE now! Grab your limited & exclusive goodies today!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1723653856/re-legend-co-op-monster-raising-rpg

Re:Legend is an upcoming co-op monster raising simulation JRPG game on PC(PS4, Xbox One, Switch is also planned).

Tame and raise mythical creatures called Magnus and venture into the world of Ethia. Farm, craft, fish, mine, re-build village, and enjoy much more activities with friends!

Re:Legend is currently in Pre-Alpha and still in development.

Follow us on:

Website: http://www.play-relegend.com

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playrelegend/

Twitter: https://twitter.com/playrelegend

Newsletter: http://eepurl.com/cvZOCv
